headline: Assessing Franklin Resources (BEN) Valuation After Strong 1 Year Return And Modest Overvaluation Signal
summary: What Franklin Resources’ Recent Returns Signal for Investors Franklin Resources (BEN) has drawn attention after a stretch of solid performance, with total return figures over the past year and multi year periods giving investors fresh data points to reassess the stock. See our latest analysis for Franklin Resources. The latest share price of US$25.66 comes after a 1 month share price return of 9.28% and an 11.95% 3 month share price return, while the 1 year total shareholder return of 43.17%...
